articles.author: Don Reisinger
articles.title: Apple course corrects for the coronavirus to keep its next iPhones on track
articles.description: This week's Apple news didn't stop at the company's Chinese production troubles.

articles.author: Bernhard Warner
articles.title: Empty pavilions, taxis without passengers: A quieter Barcelona reveals the damaging reach of coronavirus
articles.description: For the past 13 years, techies and telecoms executives have descended upon Barcelona for the the biggest industry event of the year. Its cancellation leaves a big hole in the local economy.
